main event: A civilian reported an observation of a fast-moving object with a white green tail over Booneville, Missouri on August 6, 1956.
interesting points: The object was described as being about 1/20 the size of the moon,The sighting lasted approximately 1 minute,The object traveled through 90 degrees of the sky at an altitude of about 45 degrees,The object had a yellowish white/greenish tail,There was no sound associated with the object.
sighted object: a single fast-flying object with a white green tail
witness description: manager of a facility in Booneville, Missouri
